p: For the repellent bioassays a prototype ULV devise was developed. Repellency of oil extracts against A. lineatella was evaluated using the olfactometer ULV device of Fig. 1. The apparatus consist of a modification of the device of Tripathi et al. [ 33] used for the study of repellent activity of piperitenone oxide vapors against Anopheles stephensi (Diptera: Anophelinae) as well as for other mosquito species. The major differentiation is the incorporation of the adaption of an ULV blower-pressurized sprayer system.
